# grantory_hosts (Data Source)
Use this data source to filter Grantory records inside a Terraform/OpenTofu plan.

## Example
```terraform
data "grantory_hosts" "all" {}
```


## Schema

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `hosts` (List of String) Registered host IDs.
- `id` (String) SHA256 hex of the JSON-encoded host list so the data source refreshes when hosts change.
